title: Ammadi Un Azhagu Lyrics Vellakkara Durai
stanzas:
Ammadi Un Azhagu Song Lyrics From Vellakkara Durai
#DImman #dsathyaprakash #Yugabharathi

ammadi un azhagu
semma dhoolu
unna kanda pozhudhum
thiru naalu

una paathu dhaan
thadu maaruraen
puyal kaathula
pori aaguraen

adi maadu naan
merandoduran
oru vaartha sollu
uyir thaaran

ammadi un azhaghu
semma dhoolu
unna kanda pozhudhum
thiru naalu

munnazhagil neeyum seera
pinnazhaghil yaerum bodhai
potta pulla una naan
paarthu sottu sotta
karanjaenae

rekka katti parandha aalu
potti kulla adanjaenae

aathadi nee dhaan azhukku
adaiyaadha paal norai
saethoda vaazhndhum karai
padiyaadha thaamarai

ammadi un azhaghu
semma dhoolu
unna kanda pozhudhum
thiru naalu

kann irandu podha villa
kattazhagha paathu solla
ottu motha oyila kaana
pathu senmam eduppaenae

kattu etta kaninja unna
katti vechu rasipaenae

dhesaadhi dhesam vara
thirinjaenae aambala
aanaalum kooda
Radhi una pola paakkala

ammadi un azhaghu
semma dhoolu
unna kanda pozhudhum
thiru naalu

una paathu dhaan
thadu maaruraen
puyal kaathula
pori aaguraen

adi maadu naan
merandoduran
oru vaartha sollu
uyir thaaran

seo.title: Ammadi Un Azhagu Lyrics Vellakkara Durai
seo.description: Get the complete Ammadi Un Azhagu Lyrics Vellakkara Durai from Vellakkaradurai. Read the lyrics penned by Yugabharathi and composed by D Imman and sung by Sathya Prakash. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Yugabharathi, Vellakkaradurai, D Imman, Sathya Prakash, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
